description:
Dear Student/Learner,

Greetings & its Great to know you are interested to learn through about Google Analytics & boost your learning quest & skills as well as explore the concepts of web/data analytics.

You have taken the 1st right step by been keenly interested in taking through this course which is about getting knowledge & practical know-how about Google Analytics as a web-analytics tool to help you to do better decision making.

The course is structured into simple tutorials with first understanding the concept followed by practical hands-on look through into the Google Analytics Interface.
The learner needs to have basic knowledge of internet & an instinct to know about analytics & have an keen interest for analyzing data.There are insights right from understanding the admin tab to diving deeper with understanding various reports as well as knowing basic important concepts like user management & filters as well as Goal setting and other related insights coming through in a sequential step-by-step method in the course.


To summarize through,his course willÂ  help through:

1. Any fresher/student to get ready for their 1st Job in Web Analytics Sector.

2.Help professionals clear their doubts & earn greater knowledge about using Google Analytics & doing better decision making

3.Help businesses to drive better decision making & earn Business ROI through tracking the right data.

& overall help any person to get started with the 1st set of Initiation & Insightful steps with Google Analytics.

Hope to Connect with you soon in the course & through the discussion forum soon.

Regards,

Trainer Pranav Parekh.
title: Google Analytics 2016-From been a Beginner to becoming a Pro
